description: Klövern AB is engaged in the acquisition, management, development, and sale of real estate properties. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 282 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2002-07-02. The firm is primarily engaged in the acquisition, development and management of commercial real estate properties within the areas of business and science parks, small enterprise parks and city properties. As of December 31, 2011, the Company operated a portfolio of approximately 380 properties. As of December 31, 2011, the Company had 16 wholly owned subsidiaries, such as Klovern Strand AB, Klovern Komp Strom AB and Klovern Adam AB, among others. As of December 31, 2011, the Company’s largest shareholder was Corem Property Group (20%). In December 2013, the Company acquired two office properties in Gothenburg area. In May 2014, it sold four properties in Karlstad, Landskrona, Solleftea and Harnosand in three separate transactions.
name: Klovern AB
